name: Solar Crest
description: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

abilities.name: Shine
abilities.description: Grants the target ally a physical damage barrier for a while. If not cast on self, also increases the target's armor, movement speed, and attack speed for the duration.
notes: Grants a physical damage barrier that absorbs physical damage values
Stacks additively with the same damage-type barrier sources
Has higher priority than universal damage barriers
Successive casts refresh the buff and reset the damage barrier capacity
Always places both buffs, but armor and speed increasing buff has values set to 0 when cast on self

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Pavise was purchased as well, Solar Crest's icon takes priority
The item's attributes grant 88 health and 0.4 health regeneration
Grants 48 mana, 0.2 mana regeneration and 0.4% flat base magic resistance
Provides 4 attack speed and 0.67 main armor
Adds 4 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
Adds 5.4 main attack damage to universal heroes
Movement speed bonuses from multiple Solar Crests fully stack
Stacks with all other movement speed bonuses
